Package com.techelevator.tenmo.controller

Class AccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.techelevator.tenmo.controller.AccountController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping(path="/account")
@PreAuthorize("IsAuthenticated()")
public class AccountController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the web API controller class handling pathing to the Account, Transfer, and Users tables.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AccountController​(UserDao userDao, AccountDao accountDao, TransferDao transferDao, TransferTypeDao transferTypeDao, TransferStatusDao transferStatusDao)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void changeTransStatus​(java.security.Principal principal, @Valid Transfer trans, int id)
      This API maps to the transfer ID endpoint and implements logic to update a transfer's status once it has been Approved or Rejected by the correct authenticated user to the Transfers table.
      Account getAccByUserId​(int id)
      This API maps to the User ID endpoint and returns the account belonging to the specified User ID to the authenticated user.
      Account getAccFromAccId​(int id)
      This API maps to the account ID endpoint and returns the account belonging to the specified ID to the authenticated user.
      java.util.List<Transfer> getAllTransfers()
      This API maps to the /transfer endpoint and returns all the current authenticated user's transfers.
      java.lang.Double getBalance​(java.security.Principal principal)
      This API maps to the /balance endpoint and returns the currently authenticated User's balance by searching the database for the user's name.
      java.util.List<Transfer> getPendingTransByUserId​(int userId)
      This API maps to the User's pending transfers endpoint and returns pending transfers that belong to a specified User's ID to the authenticated user.
      Transfer getTransbyId​(int id)
      This API maps to the transfer's ID endpoint and returns the transfer belonging to the specified ID to an authenticated user.
      java.util.List<Transfer> getTransByUserId​(int userId)
      This API maps to the transfer-by-user-ID endpoint and returns the transfers belonging to the specified User ID to an authenticated user.
      TransferType getTransferByDesc​(java.lang.String desc)
      This API maps to the transfer type filter and returns all transfers with the specified description to the authenticated user.
      TransferStatus getTransferStatusByDesc​(int id)
      This API maps to the transfer status ID endpoint and returns all transfers with the specified status ID to the authenticated user.
      TransferStatus getTransferStatusByDesc​(java.lang.String desc)
      This API maps to the transfer status filter and returns all transfers with the specified description to the authenticated user.
      TransferType getTransTypeFromId​(int id)
      This API maps to the transfer-type-by-ID endpoint and returns the transfer type by the type ID to an authenticated user.
      User getUserById​(int id)
      This API maps to the /getUser endpoint and returns the specified User via its User ID to an authenticated user.
      java.util.List<User> getUsers()
      This API maps to the /getUsers endpoint and returns all registered Users to an authenticated user.
      void initTransfer​(@Valid Transfer transfer, int id)
      This API maps to the /transfer endpoint and implements logic to POST a new transfer from an authenticated user to the Transfers table.

    • Method Detail

      • getUsers

        @GetMapping(path="/getUsers")
@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\')")
public java.util.List<User> getUsers()
        This API maps to the /getUsers endpoint and returns all registered Users to an authenticated user.
        Returns:
        all registered Users.

      • getUserById

        @GetMapping(path="/getUsers/{id}")
@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\')")
public User getUserById​(@PathVariable
                        int id)
        This API maps to the /getUser endpoint and returns the specified User via its User ID to an authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        id - Retrieves the User's user ID.
        Returns:
        Users by their user ID.

      • getBalance

        @GetMapping(path="/balance")
@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\')")
public java.lang.Double getBalance​(java.security.Principal principal)
        This API maps to the /balance endpoint and returns the currently authenticated User's balance by searching the database for the user's name.
        Parameters:
        principal - Retrieves the current user's credentials.
        Returns:
        the current User's account balance via their username.

      • initTransfer

        @ResponseStatus(CREATED)
@PostMapping(path="/transfer/{id}")
@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\')")
public void initTransfer​(@RequestBody @Valid
                         @Valid Transfer transfer,
                         @PathVariable
                         int id)
                  throws BadFunds
        This API maps to the /transfer endpoint and implements logic to POST a new transfer from an authenticated user to the Transfers table.
        Parameters:
        id - Provides the mapping ID number.
        transfer - Retrieves and validates passed-in transfer details.
        Throws:
        BadFunds - If the entered amount is not greater than or equal to $0.

      • getTransferByDesc

        @GetMapping(path="/transfer/type/filter")
@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\')")
public TransferType getTransferByDesc​(@RequestParam
                                      java.lang.String desc)
        This API maps to the transfer type filter and returns all transfers with the specified description to the authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        desc - Retrieves a Transfer based on the type description. (Sent, Requested)
        Returns:
        transfer based on the specified type description.

      • getTransferStatusByDesc

        @GetMapping(path="/transfer/status/filter")
@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\')")
public TransferStatus getTransferStatusByDesc​(@RequestParam
                                              java.lang.String desc)
        This API maps to the transfer status filter and returns all transfers with the specified description to the authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        desc - Retrieves a Transfer based on the status description. (Approved, Rejected, Pending)
        Returns:
        transfer based on the specified status description.

      • getTransferStatusByDesc

@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\')")
public TransferStatus getTransferStatusByDesc​(@PathVariable
                                              int id)
        This API maps to the transfer status ID endpoint and returns all transfers with the specified status ID to the authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        id - Retrieves a Transfer based on the status ID. (Approved, Rejected, Pending)
        Returns:
        transfer based on the specified status ID.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        account associated with the specified User ID.

@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\')")
public TransferType getTransTypeFromId​(@PathVariable
                                       int id)
        This API maps to the transfer-type-by-ID endpoint and returns the transfer type by the type ID to an authenticated user.

      • getPendingTransByUserId

        @GetMapping(path="/transfer/user/{userId}/pending")
@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\')")
public java.util.List<Transfer> getPendingTransByUserId​(@PathVariable
                                                        int userId)
        This API maps to the User's pending transfers endpoint and returns pending transfers that belong to a specified User's ID to the authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        userId - Retrieves pending transfers by the User's ID.
        Returns:
        pending transfers based on the specified User ID.

      • changeTransStatus

        @PutMapping(path="/transfer/{id}")
@PreAuthorize("#username == authentication.principal.username")
public void changeTransStatus​(java.security.Principal principal,
                              @RequestBody @Valid
                              @Valid Transfer trans,
                              @PathVariable
                              int id)
                       throws BadFunds
        This API maps to the transfer ID endpoint and implements logic to update a transfer's status once it has been Approved or Rejected by the correct authenticated user to the Transfers table.
        Parameters:
        principal - Retrieves credentials for the current authenticated user.
        id - Retrieves the passed-in transfer status ID.
        trans - Retrieves the specified transfer's details.
        Throws:
        BadFunds - If the entered amount is not greater than or equal to $0.
